summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the construction of a trunk sewer along Rainier Avenue from Henderson Street to Barton Place; and along certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9187 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
